name: murphys-laws-monorepo
description: Murphy's Laws - Monorepo for Web, iOS, and Android apps

scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:web
scripts.build: npm run build:backend:db && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web
scripts.lint:web: cd web && npm run lint && npm run lint:css
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
